EmailTemplate.name: 180918 Invitation: NBGH Workforce Strategy, Atlanta GA
EmailTemplate.subject: Will you be in Atlanta for NBGH?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Do you plan to attend NBGH Workforce Strategy in Atlanta? If so, we would love to see you there.
I also wanted to invite you to the VIP event on September 26th where we will spend the evening at Ponce City Market's Skyline Park - Atlanta's most popular rooftop and upscale 'theme park'.
If you are interested, register here.
Hope to see you soon!
[Signature]
